import { Card, Divider, Table, Checkbox, Row, Col } from 'antd' import React, { Component } from 'react' import UserHead from '../../../components/UserHead'; import { createFromIconfontCN } from '@ant-design/icons'; import './OrderTicket.css' const IconFont = createFromIconfontCN({ scriptUrl: '//at.alicdn.com/t/font_2779508_qg92a09n5ub.js', }) export default class OrderTicket extends Component { state = { passengers: [ { id: 1, name: '张三', age: 18 }, { id: 2, name: '李四', age: 20 }, ] } checkPassenger = (checkValus) => { const { passengers } = this.state const newArr = passengers.map((passenger) => { return checkValus.includes(passenger.id) }) console.log(newArr) } render() { const columns = [ { title: '序号', dataIndex: 'order', key: '1', align: 'center', }, { title: '席别', dataIndex: 'level', key: '2', align: 'center', }, { title: '姓名', dataIndex: 'name', key: '3', align: 'center', }, { title: '证件号码', key: '4', dataIndex: 'idCard', align: 'center', }, { title: '手机号码', key: '5', dataIndex: 'phone', align: 'center', }, { title: '操作', key: '7', render: () => ( ), align: 'center' }, ]; const data = [ { key: '1', order: 1, level: '豪华', name: '张三', idCard: '510811111111', phone: '182222', }, ] return (
